Coaching

“A great coach tells you what you need to hear not what you want to hear.” — Sagi Kalev

I offer both life coaching and professional coaching services. My life coaching practice almost always begins with a 3-session intro package. Sessions can be added ad-hoc or in sets of three. Without a package, I typically book calls 6 weeks in advance.

I generally only offer professional coaching through an employer, but if you’re interested, reach out and let’s see what’s possible.

Not sure if you need a coach or a therapist?
